Html:
Hello PHPEXCEL users,

I have been using this since i started creating reports in PHP but I dont know what went wrong with my local machine, it just started to display error messages such as Fatal error: Interface 'PHPExcel_Writer_IWriter' not found in C:\xampp\htdocs\payroll\modules\reports\Excel2007.php on line 36. It seems that on the include statement the function fails to find the PHPExcel_Writer_IWriter interface but I am sure all the files needed is in one location and that is on the reports folder. I tried to replace my localhost files with the files from the test server (which is perfectly working) but still i got the same error.

Can anyone point what goes wrong ? I've been stuck for 2 days now and still cannot figure the problem.

Thanks in advance
